title: Creative Urban Retreat – Artistic 3 Bedroom Apartment with Courtyard in Zatorze, Leszno
description: Discover this distinct 3-bedroom apartment nestled in the vibrant Zatorze neighborhood of Leszno. With 83 square meters of thoughtfully designed living space, enjoy brightness and character flowing throughout an open layout, kept cozy year-round courtesy of efficient underfloor heating. The apartment boasts a large living area, a practical storage room for supplies or bikes, and smart, motion-sensor lighting for your security. Shared, well-maintained common areas and a friendly reception desk add convenience, while large windows invite creativity and light indoors.
neighborhood_description: Live steps from Leszno’s bustling city center, within a community renowned for its creative vibe and friendly neighbors. Zatorze is close to green parks and playgrounds, making it perfect for a break from the studio or urban adventures. Perfect transport links—via public transit or highway access—keep your city explorations within easy reach.
lifestyle_benefits: inspiring space for artists and creatives
proximity to parks for outdoor sessions or relaxation
easy access to city cultural spots and coffee rooms
community-sharing vibe perfect for networking over art and design
target_buyer: Ideal for young professionals or visual creatives looking for a vibrant yet relaxed space with inspiring surroundings and urban conveniences.
market_positioning: This apartment stands out in Leszno market as a rare blend of city-centered convenience and lifestyle appeal tailored to artists and culture-focused young buyers, offering amenity-rich living that supports work-play balance.
